website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight organic blend of wool and silk fabrics feels comfortable to wear in most conditions.
pros: Features a 70/30 blend of certified organic merino wool  and silk
The blend is thin to the touch but warms like thicker, bulkier products
Can go weeks without washing, even with daily wear
cons: Fabric can feel itchy to some

customer_reviews.title: A little too itchy
customer_reviews.text: This is of fine quality and fit well However - I had to return it - for me it was just too itchy - surprising for the cost I thought I could handle a little itchy feeling .... If you wear anything over it - it's worse It Might work better under a long skirt... Nice quality though!!
customer_reviews.author: Beachwalker

customer_reviews.title: Cozy to the max
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these leggings. I luxuriate in their coziness as often as possible. A great layer underneath jeans (including skinny jeans) for cold weather. I'm a bicycle commuter for 3.5/4 seasons and these are awesome. As recommended by other reviewers, before I even tried these on I sewed the elastic band with a zig-zag stitch directly through the leggings, solving any potential irritation with a curled up elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Throw all your other leggings and long johns away!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! These are not scratchy at all. I threw all my other leggings and long johns away because these are all I wear and nothing compares to the warmth and breathe ability. No more bulky layers under my ice fishing bibs...all I wear is these long johns and wool socks. Spent three days in a fish house and they were perfect... I wore them everyday without them being damp or malodorous. They were true to size and I had no problem with the band rolling or twisting. The knees got a tiny bit loose after wearing but was not an issue for me. I will definitely be buying the top.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: the wool is very comfortable, not itchy
customer_reviews.text: the wool is very comfortable, not itchy... the size is a little on the baggy side for me but thats my fault since I ordered a large and probably should have ordered med. I wear size 12-14 womens pants but the wool stretches out a bit after wearing so they do get baggy until you wash them and then they go back to a closer fit.
customer_reviews.author: M.Warren

customer_reviews.title: these are great! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are great! Comfortable, thin enough to wear with everything, and warm. Not full weight like a thicker fuzzier thing, but definitely warmer than anything else this thin. And I've washed them dozens of times and they haven't lost shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These pants fit better than I thought they would. They are even long enough. Order your pant size and they should be perfect. If you want them real snug you could even order a size smaller as they will stretch a little. Very soft and not itchy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn B

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: fits true to size. a nice black not a brown black...soft not itchy. warm and stretchy. very pleased will be ordering again. Even has a reinforced crotch.
customer_reviews.author: Zohar

customer_reviews.title: Wear them almost every day. Just as the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Wear them almost every day. Just as the instructions say, they seem to "self clean"... hard to believe, but really, they don't smell or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I bought a Small - and I weigh ~ 132 and 5 ft. 3 inches tall. Really soft and perfect for long walks in frigid weather. No problem with itchiness for me.
customer_reviews.author: New York customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these feel on my skin, they hug every curve and keep me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, I love them. They're exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.whipp

customer_reviews.title: toasty
customer_reviews.text: These are toasty warm. I wish they weren't soooo expensive, but what I love is that they are quite thin and silky and do not bulk me up and make me look like I gained ten pounds. LOL. Nice item.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: This shrank.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the washing machine at normal temperature and it shrank. I did not even have the chance to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Wool/ silk leggings great as under layer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I got a size smaller as recommended in other reviews and the leggings fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. When I first put them on
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. When I first put them on, I thought they might be a bit itchy, but that quickly went away and I am warm and toasty :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are of a substantial material and are not itchy. They certainly keep you warm! I look forward to the winter!
customer_reviews.author: copperleaf

customer_reviews.title: Staying warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got the top and matching bottoms just in time for a particularly chilly day. Was warm and comfortable all day, and the wool was not itchy.
customer_reviews.author: DebR

customer_reviews.title: excellent fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipment, excellent fit, very comfortable. Now I just need to wear them regularly and see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: farmer

customer_reviews.title: Women's long under ware.
customer_reviews.text: They were heavenly the moment I put them on. Nice warms buns now. That horrible cold Washington weather can not get me now. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jody daniels

customer_reviews.title: Totally warm but a little bit itchy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear skiing & figured the Swiss would have the light to warm to not itchy ratios perfected so chose these even at the price. They are warm and light and perfect under ski pants - I was toasty all day. However, they are a bit itchy: maybe another layer of silk underneath would work?
customer_reviews.author: vcl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Warm comfortable. Before was wearing more than one pair thermals and still cold. These are all I need under my work clothes
customer_reviews.author: Cnh

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for long Maine winters !
customer_reviews.text: I really like the warmth and the fit of the long underwear. The waist band is not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Silk-Wool blend long underwear
customer_reviews.text: Still a bit itchy and hoping a cami will help. I am 5'4" and weigh 130 and ordered the 38/US 8 and it fit fine...a bit long. Very thin and can wear them under most anything...I've not had them long enough to wear them in our cold midwest winter so I can't say how warm they are. They are very expensive so I'm hoping they live up to their warmth and durability?
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Bought the top and bottoms. They are warm, comfortable, and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rose

customer_reviews.title: High quality product none better
customer_reviews.text: Jackpot!!!! Lightweight warm may run a little large I ordered a large next I will try medium I am a size 10. This was a replacement for thermals I had many years and could not locate any quality thermals anywhere except good old amazon. Thank you amazon for the quality products you have available.
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: It's great quality. It fit me perfect. I can't think of one bad thing to say about these pants. I would buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mikulecky

customer_reviews.title: Light and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers:These are warm and cozy to the skin, and lightweight. My only other comment also agrees with some of the others reviewers: Very pricey for "Long Johns".
customer_reviews.author: Swimslaps

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very warm
customer_reviews.text: This Hacosa thermal legging is really warm and soft to the skin. The combination of wool and silk was perfect and kept me very comfortable through the winter. I have washed it only 2 times so far and though the fabric seems very thin, I am hoping it will not tear/run in subsequent washes. I am now looking at buying the top from them, though they are on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: jasmeet kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The product is of high quality and fits excellent. The fabric is thicker than most other silk long- underwear. It is Soft, warm and a comfortable fit. The waist is stretchy and fits nicely. You can't feel the waist band. I bought a different brand to compare to and I would buy another pair of these. I went snowshoeing - 25 degrees and I sweated lots but these kept me warm and dry. Worth the money! Be good to yourself and invest in a pair.
customer_reviews.author: P S

customer_reviews.title: Not good size
customer_reviews.text: Too large so not too comfortable because of the size, Measurement did not work! and does not feel too good
customer_reviews.author: michele Cassou

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted, wonderful material, and extremely cozy winter underwear
customer_reviews.text: This garment is well cut and made, very warm, and quite comfortable -- washes nicely, but par-dry for a few minutes with wool dryer balls before hanging to air dry, otherwise they will shrink. My only negative point is the waistband elastic that tends to roll and not lie flat, a design flaw that does not override the general excellence of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Happy to wear them as a 2nd Layer.
customer_reviews.text: If you want wool leggings these are it! Wool is wool, and these are nice. Yes they are itchy for my skin; Therefore I wear them as a second layer over long underwear: And I am happy. Gratitude for The European Style with shabooties.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kathryn Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nice layer for warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love theses under my jeans to stay warm. Not to be worn alone but a wonderful layer to keep you warm. Not itchy. True to size. I am 5’7 125 lbs and the small is perfect. Expensive but worth it for a true warm layer.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Seat needs reinforcement. Holes in butt after just a couple wears.
customer_reviews.text: Holes emerged in the seat after wearing them a few times. I’m not a large woman, and the pants aren’t too small. The fabric is VERY thin, and for this price I feel it should be reinforced at the seat since that’s where the most resistance is.
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Well Made But Very Itchy
customer_reviews.text: The wool was nice quality and the product was well made. But when I tried the pants on, my legs immediately feel very itchy. I had hoped that this product would of been less itchy than some other products. Sadly had to return due to itchiness; really wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: perfect, except elastic is tight
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find these scratchy at all. They're very comfortable. But I hate tight elastic waists. On the positive side, the elastic is easy to access, so I just cut it open and sewed in a bit longer elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: European warmth in New York air conditioning.
customer_reviews.text: This no itch, wool-silk long underwear pant is the ultimate luxury in keeping warm. I work in the usual over air conditioned office space and didn't notice the cold and didn't feel overheated. Then it kept me just as warm when riding my bike. The waist band feels non-existent, so I didn't have to worry about looking extra bulky. NO SHRINKAGE in a COLD WATER machine wash, after I hung it over a hanger the pants were dry the next day. A very good product even though a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.F.

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL long underwear. I expect it to last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn silk long underwear for years (cold, cold winters here) but they are sized pretty small (made in China) and I usually poke out the knees or get runs in them before they are really worn out. These are a tiny bit more expensive and made for a more "European) body. Think Germans! Made in Switzerland, well fitted. Only drawback is that it is recommended they are hand washed. I do NOT care about that. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaBlondieTop Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: Hocosa Women’s Organic Wool-Silk Long-Underwear Pants
product_meta.description: Women's Long-Underwear Pants in 70/30% Blend of Organic Merino Wool/Silk.. The wool chosen for Hocosa woolens is KbT-certified organic, to provide the utmost in well-being. Soothingly soft, this fine wool comes from pure-bred merino sheep. It is sheered by hand and free of pesticides. Silk adds extra softness & durability. Textile weight 175 gm/square meter.
feature_bullets: 70/30 blend of soothingly soft European KbT- certified organic merino wool & silk. Wool for warmth. Silk for strength & durability.
Natural fibers breathe, maintaining a comfortable temperature in warmth or cold. Light-weight. Comfortable under clothing or worn alone.
Wool absorbs moisture without feeling wet, keeping you dry & comfortable. Even when wet, feels warm.
Natural wool with lanolin gives self-cleansing properties, minimizing need for washing. Can go weeks without washing, even with daily wear.
For best results, wash by hand with lanolin-replenishing woolwash to maintain hygienic effects.
